u.a: 'yellow' used in several contexts e .g . nice , another
voiceless alveolar fricative replaced by voiceless labio-dental fricative; second element of cluster omitted;
voiceless velar plosive replaced by voiceless alveolar plosive;

g.ga: oh dear ! something's fallen in the corner

u.a: on finding some toy soldiers in Daddy's briefcase
two separate renditions - both referring to singular object
delayed imit of parents saying 'I've got you'

CHAT.comment: ϕ is used to represent the voiced bilabial fricative.
